content.raw: Ya I think it's not going to be trivial. The collision detector is doing its job fine and returns correct contact points but just not the ones we are looking for (points closest to sonar origin). Not sure which is more difficult: 1) add a feature in the collision detector that let us give weight to certain contact points over others or 2) switch the sonar sensor implementation to a ray casting approach (with performance trade-off).
content.html: Ya I think it's not going to be trivial. The collision detector is doing its job fine and returns correct contact points but just not the ones we are looking for (points closest to sonar origin). Not sure which is more difficult: 1) add a feature in the collision detector that let us give weight to certain contact points over others or 2) switch the sonar sensor implementation to a ray casting approach (with performance trade-off).
